channel.title: java on Avery Wagar
channel.description: Recent content in java on Avery Wagar

item.title: Configuring Vim for Java Development
item.description: Welcome back, my fellow Vimmers. Today I will show you how to convert (Neo)Vim into a Java IDE. We will be discussing multiple plugins, mappings, and external tools in this post. Plugins So in my .vimrc I have a plethora of different plugins directly related to Java development. Deoplete Javacomplete2 Ale Ultisnips Tagbar Ctrl-P NERD-TREE Also we will be assuming that you have vim-plug installed as you plugin manager.
